Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

acceptedContracts().details: The contact name listed in this method is also needed to be listed `requiredContracts` method.

decrease(uint8,address,uint256,uint256,b.details: Since the total supply can be determined by totaling only the amounts on one side of the order when the order is fulfilled, the total supply is incremented only when the executor of the original order is the taker.

params._isTaker: The boolean if the original order is created by a taker

returns.maturity: The maturity of the market that the future value was added

returns._0: The boolean if the lending market is initialized or not

increase(uint8,address,uint256,uint256,b.details: Since the total supply can be determined by totaling only the amounts on one side of the order when the order is fulfilled, the total supply is incremented only when the executor of the original order is the taker.

params._isTaker: The boolean if the original order is created by a taker

initialize(address).details: Function is invoked by the proxy contract when the contract is added to the ProxyController.

params._resolver: The address of the Address Resolver contract

requiredContracts().details: The contract name list is in `./libraries/Contracts.sol`.

returns.currentAmount: Current future value amount after update
returns.isAllRemoved: The boolean if the all future value amount in the selected maturity is removed

acceptedContracts().notice: Returns contract names that can call this contract.

executeForcedReset(uint8,address).notice: Forces a reset of the user's future value.

executeForcedReset(uint8,address,int256).notice: Forces a reset of the user's future value.

hasBalanceAtPastMaturity(uint8,address,u.notice: Gets if the account has past maturity balance at the selected maturity.

requiredContracts().notice: Returns the contract names used in this contract.

reset(uint8,address,uint256).notice: Reset all amount if there is an amount in the past maturity.

setInitialTotalSupply(uint256,int256).notice: Sets initial total supply at market opening

transferFrom(uint8,address,address,int25.notice: Transfers the future value from sender to receiver.

userdoc.notice: Implements the management of the future value as an amount for Lending positions in each currency.
